attributes.title: Bugs
attributes.review: I downloaded this in the hopes of being able to educate myself for the election but all it did was crash and make my phone run very slowly. I recommend just looking up what you would like to know on google.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: When I was trying to download this app it takes 7 hours to get it completed and once I went on the app it started glitching out and said my phone had a virus and I had to get a completely new phone.

attributes.title: A Cheeto ate me!

Typing this in his tummy.
